FuncDef: The display cpu-defend filter statistics command displays statistics about packets discarded by filters. The display cpu-defend filter statistics command displays statistics about packets discarded by filters.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo: The display cpu-defend filter statistics command displays discarded packets. This helps the network administrator configure attack defense policies.
